overview: In Hank Hoffman's first all-girl feature Kiss Me, Kristen Scott, Charlotte Stokely and Jane Wilde deliver tour deforce performances and achieve a kind of intimacy that seems more documentary than scripted. Tristan (Kristen Scott) wants so much sleep with women, but at the beginning of any kiss her mind and body cause a kind of self-sabotage and she disappears into herself. Enter LGBTQ sisters in arms Jenny (Charlotte Stokely) a vlogger, and Lily (Jane Wilde) her business partner and best friend. As the three discuss sexuality Tristan's boundaries are pushed and played with. In the end Tristan and Jenny are face to face...Kiss Me
title: Kiss Me
